title: Chord: sus2 in F# (Shape: G)
content:
# Chord: sus2 in F# (Shape: G)

## Brief Description
The sus2 chord is a harmony built on the root (F#), major second (G#) and perfect fifth (C#), omitting the third of the chord. This creates a suspended sound, adding tension and a sense of anticipation that can be resolved by playing the third of the chord.

## Notes and Intervals
- Root: F# 
- Major Second: G#
- Perfect Fifth: C#

## Genre and Musical Flavor
The sus2 chord is often used in modern and alternative rock music to create a dreamy and ethereal atmosphere. It adds a sense of ambiguity to the harmony, providing a fresh and contemporary sound to compositions.

## Songs
1. "Yellow" by Coldplay
2. "Babylon" by David Gray
3. "Iris" by Goo Goo Dolls
